snippet.title: The Warhorn (PC) - Trailer (2017)
snippet.description:
In The Warhorn you will get to play as an adventurer, who decides to leave his safe homeland to start a life he always dreamed of. As the only son of a lumberjack you have basic survival skills, which will not be enough to survive in a new world. The willingness to learn and openness is the only tool you have at the start. You will visit dark, dangerous places that will help you find the answer. Key element of all dungeons are puzzles and traps.
Every place has it's own story that you can unravel by taking side quests or reading journals and notes.

The Warhorn on Steam:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/660920/The_Warhorn/

Website:
http://www.thewarhorngame.com

Facebook: 
https://www.facebook.com/thewarhorngame

Twitter: 
https://www.twitter.com/thewarhorngame

Instagram: 
https://www.instagram.com/thewarhorngame

Music:
BrunuhVille - Spirit of The Wild

BrunuhVille YT channel:
https://www.youtube.com/user/BrunuhVille
